mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.transfer_code AS "transferCode", a.generate_time AS "generateTime", a.apply_user_id AS "applyUserId", a.apply_user_name AS "applyUserName", a.out_dept_id AS "outDeptId", a.out_dept_name AS "outDeptName", a.out_warehouse_id AS "outWarehouseId", a.out_warehouse_name AS "outWarehouseName", a.into_dept_id AS "intoDeptId", a.into_dept_name AS "intoDeptName", a.into_warehouse_id AS "intoWarehouseId", a.into_warehouse_name AS "intoWarehouseName", a.warehouseentry_code AS "warehouseentryCode", a.warehouseout_code AS "warehouseoutCode", a.introduction AS "introduction", a.cancel_user_id AS "cancelUserId", a.cancel_user_name AS "cancelUserName", a.cancle_time AS "cancleTime", a.cancel_reason AS "cancelReason", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.operator_dept_id AS "operatorDeptId"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_stock_transfer( id, transfer_code, generate_time, apply_user_id, apply_user_name, out_dept_id, out_dept_name, out_warehouse_id, out_warehouse_name, into_dept_id, into_dept_name, into_warehouse_id, into_warehouse_name, warehouseentry_code, warehouseout_code, introduction, cancel_user_id, cancel_user_name, cancle_time, cancel_reason, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, operator_dept_id
) VALUES ( #{id}, #{transferCode}, #{generateTime}, #{applyUserId}, #{applyUserName}, #{outDeptId}, #{outDeptName}, #{outWarehouseId}, #{outWarehouseName}, #{intoDeptId}, #{intoDeptName}, #{intoWarehouseId}, #{intoWarehouseName}, #{warehouseentryCode}, #{warehouseoutCode}, #{introduction}, #{cancelUserId}, #{cancelUserName}, #{cancleTime}, #{cancelReason}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{operatorDeptId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_stock_transfer SET transfer_code = #{transferCode}, generate_time = #{generateTime}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId}, apply_user_name = #{applyUserName}, out_dept_id = #{outDeptId}, out_dept_name = #{outDeptName}, out_warehouse_id = #{outWarehouseId}, out_warehouse_name = #{outWarehouseName}, into_dept_id = #{intoDeptId}, into_dept_name = #{intoDeptName}, into_warehouse_id = #{intoWarehouseId}, into_warehouse_name = #{intoWarehouseName}, warehouseentry_code = #{warehouseentryCode}, warehouseout_code = #{warehouseoutCode}, introduction = #{introduction}, cancel_user_id = #{cancelUserId}, cancel_user_name = #{cancelUserName}, cancle_time = #{cancleTime}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, operator_dept_id = #{operatorDeptId}
WHERE id = #{id}
